title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 321.0 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 321.0 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) 2,4-D means 2,4

Dichlorophenoxyacetic acid. (b) 2,4-5-T means 2,4-5 Trichlorophenoxyacetic acid. (c) MCP means 2 Methyl, 4 Chlorophenoxyacetic
acid. (d) Grape vineyard means
lands upon which grapevines are maintained and harvested for profit. (e) Person means any person, copartnership, firm or corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
321.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
